title: Quotes and Poems by a Nobody
description: A collection of 156 poems, some very short, and 90 personal musings, listed as "quotes." Raw and unfiltered, often painful, frequently tinged with humor, this unique work reveals the intimate details of a young woman's life struggle: defeats and victories, setbacks and growth, insights gained, dreams lost, hopes recaptured. A bold debut from a promising new talent.
author: Tony       Evans
